[[File:JT logo.png|link=Justin Timberlake]]
{| width="100%" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="6" style="background:#FFF; text-align: justify; padding: 10px; border: 3px solid #171D74" | width="55%" style="vertical-align:top;padding: 0; margin:0;" |
{{Shortcut|WP:JT}}
{{WikiProject status|semi-active|parent=Musicians|portal=Music}} Some [[Wikipedia:Wikipedians|Wikipedian]]s have formed a [[Wikipedia:WikiProject|project]] to better organize information on articles related to '''Justin Timberlake'''. This page and its subpages contain their suggestions; it is hoped that this project will help to focus the efforts of other Wikipedians. If you would like to help, please see the [[Project talk:WikiProject Justin Timberlake|talk page]]. ---- [[File:Jtstpaul.jpg|thumb|200px|The one who brought "[[SexyBack]]"]] [[Justin Timberlake]] (born January 31, 1981) is an American singer, actor, and businessman. He achieved early fame when he appeared as a contestant on ''[[Star Search]]'', and went on to star in the [[Disney Channel]] television series ''[[The All-New Mickey Mouse Club]]'', where he met future bandmate [[JC Chasez]]. Timberlake became famous in the late 1990s as the lead singer and youngest member of the [[boy band]] [['N Sync]], whose launch was financed by [[Lou Pearlman]]. In 2002, he released his debut solo album, ''[[Justified (album)|Justified]]'', which sold more than eight million copies worldwide. The album was a commercial success, spawning the hits "[[Like I Love You]]", "[[Cry Me a River (Justin Timberlake song)|Cry Me a River]]" and "[[Rock Your Body]]". Timberlake continued his success with his second solo album, ''[[Future Sex/Love Sounds]]'' (2006), debuting at number one on the [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] chart; it was latter certified 4 times platinum by the [[Recording Industry Association of America]] (RIAA). The album produced the US number-one hit singles "[[SexyBack]]", "[[My Love (Justin Timberlake song)|My Love]]", and "[[What Goes Around... Comes Around]]". Timberlake has won six [[Grammy Awards]] and four [[Emmy Awards]]. To date, combining the sales of his two solo albums, Timberlake has sold 18 million albums worldwide. He also has an acting career, having starred in films such as ''[[The Social Network]]'', ''[[Bad Teacher]]'' and ''[[Friends with Benefits (film)|Friends with Benefits]]''. His other ventures include record label [[Tennman Records]], fashion label [[William Rast]], and the restaurants Destino and Southern Hospitality. ==Scope== The scope of the project covers articles about Justin Timberlake and his life and work. Included are also people and things directly related to - or who have achieved a significant part of their notability through their connection to Justin Timberlake as an individual. All of these articles should be placed in the [[:Category:Justin Timberlake]] or one of its subcategories. ==Participants== To add yourself to the current members list, simply click [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Wikipedia:WikiProject_Rihanna&action=edit§ion=2 here] and insert # {{User|YOURNAME}} # {{User|Tomica}} # {{User|Status}} # {{User|Hahc21}} # {{User|Hlm Z.}} == Recognized content == {{main|Wikipedia:WikiProject Justin Timberlake/Assessment}} {{Wikipedia:Version 1.0 Editorial Team/Justin Timberlake articles by quality statistics}} ===Featured articles=== *{{classicon|FA}} "[[4 Minutes (Madonna song)|4 Minutes]]" (appeared on the main page as Today's Featured Article on May 15, 2015) *{{classicon|FA}} "[[Cry Me a River (Justin Timberlake song)|Cry Me a River]]" *{{classicon|FA}} "[[Rehab (Rihanna song)|Rehab]]" ===Featured lists=== *{{classicon|FL}} [[Justin Timberlake videography]] *{{classicon|FL}} [[Justin Timberlake discography]] ===Featured topics=== ===Good articles=== {{Col-begin}} *{{classicon|GA}} "[[Carry Out]]" *{{classicon|GA}} "[[Don't Let Me Down (Leona Lewis song)|Don't Let Me Down]]" *{{classicon|GA}} ''[[Friends with Benefits (film)|Friends with Benefits]]'' *{{classicon|GA}} "[[FutureSex/LoveSound]]" *{{classicon|GA}} ''[[FutureSex/LoveSounds]]'' *{{classicon|GA}} ''[[Justified (album)|Justified]]'' *{{classicon|GA}} "[[Love Sex Magic]]" *{{classicon|GA}} "[[My Love (Justin Timberlake song)|My Love]]" *{{Classicon|GA}} "[[SexyBack]]" *{{classicon|GA}} "[[Señorita (song)|Señorita]]" *{{classicon|GA}} "[[Summer Love (Justin Timberlake song)|Summer Love]]" *{{classicon|GA}} "[[What Goes Around... alerts}} ==Templates== Templates related to the project should be listed here. ===Membership template=== Members should place [[:Wikipedia:WikiProject Justin Timberlake/Userbox|this userbox]] somewhere in their userpage to show project membership. {{Wikipedia:WikiProject Justin Timberlake/Userbox}} ===Assessment template=== Add this template {{tl|WikiProject Justin Timberlake}} to articles related to Rihanna for it to be assessed. Don't forget to add the class and importance by adding class=B/C/GA/FA/FL.... and importance=top/mid/low.. ====Project templates==== It is recommended that Project members add each of the following Project pages to their watchlists. {| border=1 bgcolor=#fffff8 cellpadding=3 style="margin-left:1em; color: black; border-color=black;" !Code !Result |- |{{tl|WikiProject Justin Timberlake}} |{{WikiProject Justin Timberlake|class=NA|category=no}} |- |{{tl|Justin Timberlake}} |{{Justin Timberlake}} |- |'''{{tlx|Wikipedia-Books|Justin Timberlake}}''' |{{Wikipedia-Books|Justin Timberlake|position=left}} |- |'''{{Wikipedia:WikiProject Justin Timberlake/Userbox}}''' |{{Wikipedia:WikiProject Justin Timberlake/Userbox}} |- |{{tl|WikiProject Justin Timberlake Invitation}} |
{| style="background:whitesmoke" |- | [[File:Jtstpaul.jpg|140px]] | style="text-align:center;" |'''Hello!'''
I noticed you've made edits to [[Justin Timberlake]] articles. I thought you may be interested in joining
'''[[Wikipedia:WikiProject Justin Timberlake]]'''
We are a group of editors working to improve Wikipedia's coverage of topics related to Justin Timberlake, his discography and filmography. If you would be interested in joining feel free to [[Wikipedia:WikiProject_Justin Timberlake#Participants|visit the Participants Page!]]
Thank You. [[Category:WikiProject Justin Timberlake]] |}
|} ==Categories== {{Category tree|Justin Timberlake}} ==Tools== :''Main tool page: [[tools:~dispenser/view/Tools|toolserver.org]]'' *[[tools:~dispenser/view/Reflinks|Reflinks]] – Edits bare references - adds title/dates etc. to bare references *[[tools:~dispenser/view/Checklinks|Checklinks]] – Edit and repair external links *[[tools:~dispenser/view/Dab_solver|Dab solver]] – Quickly resolve ambiguous links. *[[tools:~dispenser/view/Peer_reviewer|Peer reviewer]] – Provides hints and suggestion to improving articles. {{WikiProject Music/Related WikiProjects}} {{Wikipedia policies and guidelines}} {{WikiProject Footer}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Justin Timberlake}} [[Category:WikiProject Musicians|Justin Timberlake]] [[Category:WikiProject Justin Timberlake| ]]
